rooms.description: Open space for reception and guest access; incorporates a waiting area with seating.
Spacious Mediterranean living room with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting.
Adjacent dining area designed for communal meals with an adjoining outdoor terrace.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with an island counter and integrated dining area.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and private balcony; positioned to harness the morning sun.
Secondary bedroom designed for privacy and relaxation.
Additional bedroom ensuring space for family members or guest.
Another bedroom designed for comfort and privacy.
Fifth bedroom integrated within the penthouse layout.
Primary en-suite bathroom for master bedroom with high-end fixtures.
Guest bathroom accessible from the entrance hall.

openings.description: Main entrance with a covered porch, designed for maximum Vastu compliance by aligning the entry in the northeast direction.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living room and master bedroom to promote natural light.
Interior doorways connecting rooms with minimal obstructions for positive energy flow.
Balconies attached to bedrooms and living area to ensure a view of the garden.

levels.notes: The layout integrates Vastu principles by ensuring proper room orientation with respect to cardinal directions and sunlight exposure. The private gym is designed as an extension in the southeastern corner of the ground floor, adjacent to utility areas.
